Average Rating: 4.6

Review Title: Worst Thanksgiving movie ever!

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Created Equal: Clarence Thomas In His Own Words
Review Date: 2021/04/06
Store: Clarence Thomas  (Actor),     Joe Biden  (Actor),     Michael Pack  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Documentary
Product Description: ['Although Clarence Thomas remains a controversial figure, few know him beyond his contentious U.S. Supreme Court confirmation battle. But behind the headlines, Thomas life is a classic American tale: born poor in the segregated South, only to become one of the most influential justices in the highest court of the land. Created Equal tells Thomas life story truly and fully, without cover-ups or distortions.']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Joe Biden, Michael Pack, Ginni Thomas, Clarence Thomas, Anita Hill', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Michael Pack', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 2, 2021', 'Actors': 'Clarence Thomas, Joe Biden, Anita Hill, Ginni Thomas', 'Studio': 'Breaking Glass', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: This documentary can be purchased at Vudu.
Review Title: Avoid Amazon's Censorship and Book Banning

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Django Unchained
Review Date: 2021/07/04
Store: Jamie Foxx  (Actor),     Christoph Waltz  (Actor),     Quentin Tarantino  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Set in the South two years before the Civil War, DJANGO UNCHAINED stars Academy Award ®-winner Jamie Foxx as Django, a slave whose brutal history with his former owners lands him face-to-face with a German-born bounty hunter Dr. King Schultz (Academy Award®-winner Christolph Waltz). Schultz is on the trail of the murderous Brittle brothers, and only Django can lead him to his bounty. The unorthodox Schultz acquires Django with a promise to free him upon the capture of the Brittles – dead or alive. Success leads Schultz to free Django, though the two men choose not to go their separate ways. Instead, Schultz seeks out the South’s most wanted criminals with Django by his side. Honing vital hunting skills, Django remains focused on one goal: finding and rescuing Broomhilda (Kerry Washington), the wife he lost to the slave trade long ago. Django and Schultz’s search ultimately leads them to Calvin Candie (Academy Award®-nominee Leonardo DiCaprio), the proprietor of “Candyland,” an infamous plantation. Exploring the compound under false pretenses, Django and Schultz rouse the suspicion of Stephen (Academy Award®-nominee Samuel L. Jackson), Candie’s trusted house slave. Their moves are marked, and a treacherous organization closes in on them. If Django and Schultz are to escape with Broomhilda, they must choose between independence and solidarity, between sacrifice and survival…', 'Amazon.com', "From the moment Jamie Foxx throws off a filthy, tattered blanket to reveal a richly muscled back crisscrossed with long scars, it's obvious that", 'Django Unchained', "will be both true to its exploitation roots but also clear-eyed about the misery that's being exploited. Django (Foxx), a slave set free in the years before the Civil War, joins with a German dentist-turned-bounty hunter (the marvelous Christoph Waltz,", 'Inglourious Basterds', "), who has promised to help Django rescue his wife (Kerry Washington), who's still enslaved to a gleeful and grandiose plantation owner (Leonardo DiCaprio, plainly relishing the opportunity to play an out-and-out villain). What follows is a wild and woolly ride, crammed with all the pleasures one expects from a revenge fantasy written and directed by Quentin Tarantino. Plot-wise, some things happen a little too easily (for example, Django instantly becomes a master gunslinger), but the moral perspective is not glib. For all its lurid violence and jazzy dialogue, this is a still-rare movie that paints slavery for what it was: a brutal, dehumanizing practice that allowed a privileged few to profit from the suffering of many, a practice guaranteed by the gun and the whip. Think of it as the antidote to", 'Gone with the Wind', '. Tarantino is more heartfelt in', 'Django Unchained', 'than in any of his previous movies--without sacrificing any of the pell-mell action, tension, and delicious language that made', 'Reservoir Dogs', ',', 'Kill Bill', ', and', 'Pulp Fiction', 'so very enjoyable.', '--Bret Fetzer']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Western', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Jamie Foxx, Pilar Savone, Stacey Sher, Don Johnson, Kerry Washington, Franco Nero, Walton Goggins, James Remar, Leonardo DiCaprio, Michael Parks, Brown 26 Productions, LLC, Dennis Christopher, Reginald Hudlin, Christoph Waltz, Quentin Tarantino, Samuel JacksonJamie Foxx, Pilar Savone, Stacey Sher, Don Johnson, Kerry Washington, Franco Nero, Walton Goggins, James Remar, Leonardo DiCaprio, Michael Parks, Brown 26 Productions, LLC, Dennis Christopher, Reginald Hudlin, Christoph Waltz, Quentin Tarantino, Samuel Jackson  See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 46 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '13132597256', 'Director': 'Quentin Tarantino', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 16, 2013', 'Actors': 'Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington, Samuel Jackson', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Reginald Hudlin, Pilar Savone, Stacey Sher', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '2'}

Review Title: Garbage

For all its lurid violence and jazzy dialogue, this is a still-rare movie that paints slavery for what it was: a brutal, dehumanizing practice that allowed a privileged few to profit from the suffering of many, a practice guaranteed by the gun and the whip. Think of it as the antidote to", 'Gone with the Wind', '. Tarantino is more heartfelt in', 'Django Unchained', 'than in any of his previous movies--without sacrificing any of the pell-mell action, tension, and delicious language that made', 'Reservoir Dogs', ',', 'Kill Bill', ', and', 'Pulp Fiction', 'so very enjoyable.', '--Bret Fetzer']
Average Rating: 4.8

POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has had numerous positive experiences with their purchases, highlighting engaging plot twists and captivating storytelling. They expressed appreciation for films that resonate with them, noting excellent narratives and high production quality. Fast delivery and good pricing were also emphasized in their favorable interactions, indicating satisfaction with the shopping experience overall. Films that provided historical insights or enjoyable characters received high ratings, showing a preference for content that entertains and informs.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
Conversely, the user has reported several negative experiences, mainly focusing on films they found historically inaccurate or boring. Critiques were directed towards poorly executed plotlines that failed to engage, leading to disappointing viewing experiences. Specific comments reflected disdain for confusing story elements, unlikable characters, and perceived wasted time or investment in mediocre productions. The user expressed frustration with films lacking originality or coherence, impacting their overall satisfaction.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's purchase history reflects a mixed engagement with various films. While they celebrate well-crafted narratives and enjoy compelling plot twists and strong performances, they also voice significant criticism over films they deem lackluster or poorly executed. Their enjoyment appears largely tied to the quality and historical integrity of the content. Fast delivery and reasonable pricing contribute positively to the shopping experience, but disappointing narratives and disconnection with characters tend to overshadow their overall enthusiasm for certain genres.

target_interaction.title: A silly artsy western
target_interaction.text: Extremely bad to the point of being funny and entertaining, cannot be taken serious.  Probably scripted by a barista in Portlandia.
